price: 28. Votre création et votre résurrection sont (aussi aisées que) celles d’une seule âme. Allah Entend Tout et Voit Tout.
arabic: مَّا خَلۡقُكُمۡ وَلَا بَعۡثُكُمۡ إِلَّا كَنَفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٌ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: mā khalqukum walā baʿthukum illā kanafsin wāḥidatin inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
